title: the new annoucer voice i hate it i need help
body: can any one here help to change it to the old one it tiltes me soo much in game i cant focus on the game cause im not familliar with it

replies.body: I agree, it throws me off and got me killed the first ranked game i played with it on... but hopefully it ends sooner than later... GP voiceover was cool but this one is definitely a misstep on Riots part imo.

Looks like you noticed our little change for the new Dark Star mode. We wanted to have a little fun and bring the Dark Star mythos to the Summoners Rift as well as it's own game mode, but rest assured that the old voice will come back when the event has ended!
More to the point of OP original question, there is an option to disable it, in the in-game option menu, sound tab, at the very bottom of the screen.

Looks like we did add a way for you to turn off that custom announcer voice after all! It wasn't something that was included in the patch notes, which made it a little hard to find, but thanks to our players we were able to find it.

https://i.gyazo.com/59407cf4217864925713e8043eeb33c0.png
There is an option to disable it, in the in-game option menu, sound tab, at the very bottom of the screen. "Disable custom announcer" or something like that.
